item.title: Wildfires in Southern California
item.description: Plus, we explain why Facebook is getting rid of fact-checking.

item.title: Ukraine Strikes Oil Depot Near Russian Air Base, Ukrainian Military Says
item.description: The attack was the latest effort to inflict pain on Russia even as Kyiv is losing ground on the battlefield at home.

item.title: Italy Says Cecilia Sala, Journalist Detained by Iran, Has Been Released
item.description: Cecilia Sala, 29, who was detained last month while on a reporting trip, was on a plane home, the Italian government announced.

item.title: Wildfires Roar Through L.A., and Trump Floats U.S. Expansion
